author: kkolinko
msg: Improve performance of org.apache.tomcat.util.file.Matcher which is to filter JARs for scanning during web application start. Based on a patch by Sheldon Shao.
It is backport of r1615876 and r1617470.

author: jacopoc
msg: Applied fix from trunk for revision: 1617473
Some optimization for service event handler to prevent unnecessary operations at every service invocation.
